topText: Prepare your home for a showing or moving in. We can help you with most things!

PRO.title: Want to talk with an expert?
PRO.description: Get help planning and realising your dreams with an expert. We offer a free advice-session for all types of projects, in collaboration with Dryft (page in Swedish).

PAINTING.title: Move to a freshly painted home
PAINTING.description: Get help with painting and wallpapering by experienced decorators, we’ll make sure you get the help you require!

MODAL.modalDescriptionTop: Describe what you need help with and we’ll get back to you with a proposal within short.
MODAL.helpDescriptionTop: Do you need advice related to renovations, or are you uncertain what service to book?
MODAL.helpDescriptionBottom: Describe what you need help with and we’ll get back to you within short.
MODAL.modalDescriptionBottom: Examples of what we can help you with:
MODAL.confirmationText: We have recieved your request and will get back to you shortly!
MODAL.talkToProTitle: Want to talk with an expert?

talkToProFormHeader: Do you prefer to send a written request?
talkToProFormText: No problems! Using the form below, you can send your question to us and we will get back to you in a few hours. Feel free to add images.

SIMPLIFIED.description: Do you need help with renovation or fixes in your home? Tell us what you need help with and we'll get back to you with suggestions and pricing.
SIMPLIFIED.formDescription: Fill in the form below and a move coordinator will contact you shortly to discuss your needs and provide you with a quote.
SIMPLIFIED.textareaLabel: What do you need help with?
SIMPLIFIED.textareaPlaceholder: Describe what you need help with, e.g. painting, wallpapering, flooring, carpentry etc.
SIMPLIFIED.whenPlaceholder: E.g. 'within 2 weeks' or 'after move on March 15'
SIMPLIFIED.successMessage: We have received your request and a move coordinator will contact you shortly.

errors.descriptionRequired: Please describe what you need help with
errors.phoneInvalid: Please enter a valid phone number
errors.phoneMax: Phone number must be at most 12 digits
errors.phoneMin: Phone number must be at least 5 digits
errors.whenRequired: Please specify when you need help
